page.title: 04Lwr Langage Fm. Plym.St.Mary
page.content: Lower Langage Farm is well enclosed and it is next door to Higher Langage Farm. Farming is a full time job, and the farmer said he would never retire,and he now works on his own.Unluckily the family will not carry on the farm. He was a{dairy farmer}but ten years ago he changed to{beef.}This doesn't give as much money but the hours are easier! Last year due to the drought his cattle didn't have enough feed.He also lost seven cows due to {Salmonella. He uses British built machinery mainly,but he finds no need for {computers. Although the{Industrial Estate}is being built nearby,he will not lose any land and he is not affected so far.
